attributes.action: Nightclub festival vaccine passports to be disallowed due to basic human rights
attributes.background:
The government have announced vaccine passports for nightclubs and large events will be made mandatory for entry. This is against a persons human rights and unfair if they choose they do not want the vaccine. 
It is an individuals choice wether they get the vaccine it should not be made mandatory.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671
